SA14bsa050_u:717: ādhyātmikāyatanaśeṣam aśeṣam evam ātmīyavastuviṣayo 'pi ca tadvivekī // Ps_6.58 //
SA14bsa050_u:718: bāhyeṣu dhātuṣu śarīrasamāśritānāṃ nālpo 'pi lakṣaṇavirodhakṛto 'sti bhedaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:719: vijñānadhāturapi ca kṣaṇikaḥ sa nātmā tasmātparo 'pi ca nabhaḥkusumaiḥ samānaḥ // Ps_6.59 //
SA14bsa050_u:720: ityetadudbhavati kevalameva duḥkhaṃ tṛṣṇāvimūḍhamanaso vigmāttu tasyāḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:721: śāntiḥ parā bhavati tarṣaharastu mārgaḥ śīlaṃ samādhipariśuddhatayā ca dṛṣṭiḥ // Ps_6.60 //
SA14bsa050_u:722: tattatpratītya bhavatīti viśuddhadṛṣṭirnāstyasti veti samupaiti sa naiva kiṃ cit /
SA14bsa050_u:723: māyāmayaṃ jagadidaṃ pratibhāti tasya tasmāt sukhādiṣu bhavatyavikāradhīraḥ // Ps_6.61 //
SA14bsa050_u:724: āsīdbhaviṣyati ca yat tad apīdṛgeva kaḥ saṃbhavo yadasukhaṃ na bhaved bhavebhyaḥ /
SA14bsa050_u:725: evaṃ vyatītaviṣayeṣvapi vītarāgo naivābhinandati bhavāṃśca bhaviṣyato 'pi // Ps_6.62 //
SA14bsa050_u:727: tatpraiṣyavṛttikapaṭānyanucintya rajyed viśvāsameva ca yathocitamatra yāyāt // Ps_6.63 //
SA14bsa050_u:729: hīneṣu niṣpraṇayabuddhirudārabhāvān nirvātumicchati na buddhaguṇānalabdhvā // Ps_6.64 //
SA14bsa050_u:732: hīnociteṣu na matirnamati praṇītā saṃtiṣṭhate mahati nāmahatī kadā cit /
SA14bsa050_u:733: saṃsyandate śucibhireva śucisvabhāvaṃ tulyaistathānyadapi śāsvata eṣa yogaḥ // Ps_6.66 //
SA14bsa050_u:734: svapnopamāni vigaṇayya sukhāsukhāni saṃmohadoṣakṛpaṇāṃ janatāṃ ca teṣu /
SA14bsa050_u:735: ātmārtha eva gurutāṃ katham asya yāyād vyāpārabhāramavadhūya parārtharamyam // Ps_6.67 //
SA14bsa050_u:737: sarvatra śāntamatiradvayamārgacārī so 'tyadbhutaścaritanirvṛta eva loke // Ps_6.68 //
SA14bsa050_u:739: lokasya yā nayanatāmiva saṃprayāti dīptāṃśumaṇḍalatalotpatitā prabheva // Ps_6.69 //
SA14bsa050_u:741: nātmābhikhedapariviklavatāṃ sa yāti yānasya buddhaguṇasaṃjananasya loke // Ps_6.70 //
SA14bsa050_u:743: tadgāminaṃ pariharanti ca yānamārgaṃ kiṃ nāma kāraṇamṛte śaṭhaceṣṭitebhyaḥ // Ps_6.71 //
SA14bsa050_u:745: sarvajñayānamapayānam anarthapaṅkād ākroṣṭumarhati na cejjagato 'sya vairam // Ps_6.72 //
SA14bsa050_u:747: cittaṃ narasya karuṇāmṛdu kasya na syāt tanmohadoṣaśamanāya dṛḍhaṃ ca vīryam // Ps_6.73 //
SA14bsa050_u:748: prajñāyā janayati yaḥ parāṃ viśuddhiṃ nirmokṣaḥ kathamiva tasya dūrataḥ syāt /
SA14bsa050_u:749: naivāsmātparataramasti śīlam anyat tattasmād bhajata vimokṣakāṅkṣiṇo hi // Ps_6.74 //
